mapper.select: SELECT pil_info.id,pil_city.name as cname,pil_area.name as aname, pil_info.name as pname,pil_info.desc as describle, pil_stop_info_charge.price, pil_stop_info_charge.paytype as payType, pil_stop_info.begin_time as happen FROM pil_city,pil_area,pil_info,pil_stop_info,pil_stop_info_charge WHERE pil_city.id=pil_area.cid AND pil_stop_info_charge.siid=pil_stop_info.id AND pil_info.aid=pil_area.id
